A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't waste your time\, especially if you are a fan of Star Wars.  This story is poorly thought out and the execution was even worse.  This movie isn't consistent with The Force Awakens\,let alone the Original Trilogy. I had originally rated this movie as 1/2 star but it was brought to my attention that anything less than a star isn't factored into the average on this site. When those reviews are taken into account\, this move has an audience score of  like 24% ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWPAbKEmd5M )\nI will not go see Solo A Star Wars Story\,  Episode 9 or any of the Rian Johnson Trilogy in theaters or buy the Blu-Ray because of this movie. I am disappointed at all the sell out critics that pretend that is is a great movie.
